title: FPS Issues on Windowed Mac
body:
My Mac may be old but I never had too many issues with FPS or at least anything major.
Graphics card is: Intel HD Graphics 3000 384MB
I've started to notice that since the previous patch I've begun to have FPS issues. My normal 45-60 has now dropped to a 20-35 and even lower sometimes going from 9-20 FPS. The worst I've had was a game where my FPS dropped down to a 0-5 FPS. I've only noticed this while in windowed mode. I don't experience any FPS issues with fullscreen.

Note: I do not play on fullscreen because the game will sometimes not connect, and in other cases just crash. As well fullscreen will crash more often than windowed while in game.

replies.body: Sometimes when the client updates you need to make a few other updates to your computer to ensure the client still interacts with your system in the correct way. Check out the steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#section-mac) paying extra attention to the NVRAM and automatic graphics switching.
